utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What the hell is that?!! What the hell is that? Is that you? Ohhhhhhh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Boy, you are really not a morning person.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: BACK OFF!!! Get up! Get up! Get up! God damn it! Get up, get up, get up, get up, get up!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s the chick! She’s…going through some changes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well the vet seems to think that’s she’s becoming a rooster. We’re getting a second opinion.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what are you doing shopping at eight in the morning?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I’ve been up since six. Thanks to somebody’s dumb-ass rooster.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys you really should get rid of those animals. They shouldn’t be living in an apartment.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Especially not with all of these knives and cookbooks around…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. I’m gonna go to the fertility doctor and um, see if I’m ready to have Frank and Alice’s embryo transferred into my uterus.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Now, how will they know if you’re ready?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, they’re just gonna umm, look to see if my endometria layer is thick.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I can uh, check that for ya.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good luck. And I’m still right!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She’s mad because I know today’s her laundry day and that means she’s wearing her old lady underpants.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can check that for ya.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just—I can’t believe that you think that you and Chandler know me and Rachel better than we know you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well… we-we do. You can only eat Tic Tacks in even numbers.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And you… Ross, I believe, if you check Rachel’s bag you will find a half-eaten box of cookies in there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m so not impressed. Everybody snacks when they shop.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Ross, how many items left in that bag?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, ten bucks says that we can name every item in that bag.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How many guesses do you get?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! There’s no orange juice in there! We win!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well, we won that one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no, not for like another two weeks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How did you know she would buy scotch tape?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, we used there’s up last night making scary faces.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right! Ten buck! Fork it over! Cough it up! Pay the piper! Gimme it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That does not mean you know us better, I-I want a rematch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and none of these stupid grocery questions, real personal questions.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! And the winner gets a hundred bucks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! All right, who-who makes up the questions?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh sure, "Ross will do it!" It’s not like he has a job, or a child, or a life of his own.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Zane
utterance.content: It looks like your uterus is ready for implantation.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! I knew it! I knew it! I felt really thick this morning.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Well, okay, so what’s now—go get, go get the eggs, put ‘em in there.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Zane
utterance.content: Okay, it’ll take just a little while to prepare the embryos.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Five? Okay, where am I giving birth, a hospital or a big box under the stairs?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Zane
utterance.content: We do five because that gives you a 25% chance that at least one will attach.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s it! 25 percent? That means that’s it’s like 75 percent chance of no baby at all!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Hey, y’know I was thinking, what are the odds like if-if, if you stuff like 200 of them in there?

utterance.speaker: Alice
utterance.content: Sweety, now, she’s a woman, not a gumball machine.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, well y’know what, don’t worry you guys, ‘cause I’m-I’m gonna do this as many times as it takes to get it right.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Well, you see, the-the thing is, we-we only got, we kinda have one shot to make it right.

utterance.speaker: Alice
utterance.content: Umm, it costs $16,000 each time you do this. So, umm, we’re kinda using all the money we have to do it just this one time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whoa!! That—okay, that’s a lot of pressure on me and my uterus. So, well okay, so is there—is maybe is there something that I can do y’know just to like help make sure I get pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! You guys really don’t know anything!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: I know! Why don’t you get drunk! That worked for a lot of girls in my high school.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You guys! Do you realize that any minute now, Phoebe can be pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know! I know, it’s such a huge, life-altering thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, each team will answer ten questions. The first team that answers the most questions wins. Okay, the categories are, Fears and Pet Peeves, Ancient History, Literature, and It’s All Relative. Now, the coin toss to see who goes first. Okay, somebody call it this time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s heads. Gentlemen, pick your category.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What is Monica’s biggest pet peeve?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: According to Chandler, what phenomenon scares the bejeezus out of him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Michael Flatley, Lord of the Dance!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: His legs flail about as if independent of his body!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica and I have a grandmother who died, you both went to her funeral, name that grandmother!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you sure it was Althea?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Every week, the TV Guide comes to Chandler and Joey’s apartment. What name appears on the address label?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler gets it! It’s Chandler Bing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m afraid the TV Guide comes to Chinandolor Bong.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I knew that! Rachel! Use you’re head!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello, tiny embryos. Well, I’m-I’m Phoebe Buffay, hi! I’m-I’m-I’m hoping to be your uterus for the next nine months. You should know, that we’re doing this for Frank and Alice, who you know, you’ve been there! Umm, y’know they want you so much, so when you guys get in there, really grab on. Okay, and-and I promise that I’ll keep you safe and warm until you’re ready to have them take you home, so… Oh! And also, umm next time you see me, I’m screaming, don’t worry, that’s what’s supposed to happen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, the score is nine to eight in favor of the guys. Ladies if you miss this the game is theirs, pick your category.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You don’t have to shout everything.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ooh. What is the name of Chandler’s father’s Las Vegas all-male burlesque?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, we have a tie. Luckily, I have prepared for such an event. The Lightning Round!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thirty seconds, all the questions you can answer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You guys are dead, I am so good at lighting rounds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I majored in lightning rounds. All right, we’re gonna destroy you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I’m so confused as to what we’ve been doing so far…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How about we play for more money, say 150?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, I don’t want to lose 200 dollars.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m just trying to spice it up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, so let’s play for some pepper! Stop spending my money!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got it! How about, if we win, they have to get rid of the rooster?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, no way, that rooster’s family!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you have against the duck?! He doesn’t make any noise!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, he gets the other one all riled up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, hold on! If you win, we give up the birds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But if we win, we get your apartment.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, betting the apartment, I don’t know about this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, I have not missed one question the whole game. I own this game! Look at my hand.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why? Do you have the answers written on there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Steady as a rock! Now, are you with me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, gentlemen, you’re up first.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You have 30 seconds. And the lightning round begins—stop it —now. What was Monica’s nickname when she was a field hockey goalie?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct. Rachel claims this is her favorite movie…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct. Her actual favorite movie is...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct. In what part of her body did Monica get a pencil stuck at age 14?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Eww! No!! Her ear! All right, Monica categorizes her towels. How many categories are there?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 11, unbelievable 11 is correct. All right, that’s 4 for the guys. Ladies, you’re up.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 30 seconds on the clock. 5 questions wins the game. The lightning round begins…now! What is Joey’s favorite food?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct. Chandler was how old when he first touched a girl’s breast?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, had an imaginary childhood friend. His name was?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct! What is Chandler Bing’s job?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh gosh, it has something to do with numbers.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 10 seconds, you need this or you lose the game.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s umm, it has something to do with transponding.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s not even a word! I can get this! I can get this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can’t just call Monica’s room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure I can, standard shotgun rules, I’m sight of the room and I called it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Man, I feel like I’m coming down with something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. I bet you can’t guess what color my tonsils are? I’ll bet the apartment!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I would never bet this apartment. It’s too nice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey—ooh Pheebs, are they in there?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, freaked. ‘Cause it turns out that the odds are really sucky. And! This is Frank and Alice’s like only shot. Like, they are literally putting all of their eggs in my basket.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, but I bet it works.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I’m gonna go take a pregnancy test, right now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh wow! You can tell this soon.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well the doctor says it takes a couple days, but my body’s always been a little faster than Western medicine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! I can’t believe you guys are actually think you’re moving in here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, it was a stupid bet! We were just playing a game!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You can’t just ignore the bet! It’s a bet! You bet and you bet and if you lose, you lose the bet!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look Rach, we have to move. I mean if they had lost, we would’ve made them get rid of the birds. Right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, look, I hate this as much as you, but if it makes you feel better, it’s all your fault.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chinadolor Bong, come on, we steal that TV Guide every week!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t care, I’m not going anywhere.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s only been a couple of hours, so just give it some time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, all right. Meanwhile, I’m gonna do whatever I can to help this so, I’m just gonna y’know, lie it your chair, Y'know? Yeah, good, I’m let gravity y’know, do its jobs.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Rach, can you give me a hand with this box?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Put that box down! We are not going anywhere! This is my apartment and I like it! This is a girl’s apartment! That is a boy’s apartment, it’s dirty and it smells. This is pretty. It’s-it’s so pretty! And look, and it’s-it’s purple! And I’m telling you, you with the steady hand, I am not moving, and now I have got the steady hand.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s right! You do what the hand says!

utterance.speaker: Alice
utterance.content: Hi, Phoebe! We were just at the drugstore and we got you a little present.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Umm, it’s a lollipop and a uh, a home pregnancy test.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, don’t mix those up, you could really ruin that lollipop.

utterance.speaker: Alice
utterance.content: So umm, you feel like taking a test? There’s only one question.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I will. No, I will. But umm, y’know just remember that it’s still really early, okay so, if it says that I’m not pregnant, that doesn’t mean that I’m not gonna get pregnant, okay and, and just please, just so I don’t go completely nuts, just try not put all your hopes on this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know what, you are mean boys, who are just being mean!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, don’t get mad at us! No one forced you to raise the stakes!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is not true. She did! She forced me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, we would still be living here if hadn’t gotten the question wrong!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Would you all stop yelling in our apartment! You are ruining moving day for us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Will you stop calling it your apartment!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys! You guys! You’re gonna have a baby! They’re gonna have a baby!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: MY SISTER’S GONNA HAVE MY BABY!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, but this can’t be good for the baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I think I saw some in here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know! But maybe if we keep that drawer shut, it’ll die.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t believe we’re living here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did you see the size of the closets?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t believe we live here!
